
# UP
-----

START TRANSACTION;


CREATE TABLE "Task" (
    "id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "name" text NOT NULL,
    "description" text NOT NULL,
    "status_id"  integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Task" PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);


COMMIT;

# DOWN
-----

START TRANSACTION;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "Task";

COMMIT
